x_Params.description: These options can be specified at the command line. use / ie: /silent or /IPaddr <ippaddr>

x_Param.usage: displays usage information
displays usage information
defines the type of UI
Uninstalls the device driver and associated software.
Forces uninstall of the device driver and associated software.
Indicates Hardware First install.
Indicates the Post Name set up on a Hardware First install.
use the specified path to the InstallerParams XML config File
use the specified InstallerConfig XML config File Name
only installs the Driver and connects the device
run installer with additional Network logging
skips the checking for administrator privileges
parameter from smallville
parameter from smallville
Silent: do preload of components to prepare for USB PnP
Silent: find device with ipv4 address
Silent: find device with ipv6 address
Silent: find device by HostName
Silent: find device by Mac address (HW Addresss)
Silent: allows install to proceed
